labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Search will always only contain results from the first "Test" channel
data.expected_result: Search should only contain results from the second "Test" channel
data.short_description: Search only contains results from first channel of channels with same name when using "cmd/ctrl" + "f"
data.steps_to_repro: - Create 2 (or more) channels with the same name like "Test" - Make sure there are messages in both channels - Open second "Test" channel (make sure it isn't the first one) - Use `ctrl/cmd` + `f` there to open the search with channel filter - Click enter - Observe the search results
